entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one to whom the students are telling about their first lessons.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is described as resting his head on Harry's knee and drooling all over his robes.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one whose robes are being drooled on by Fang.

relationships.description: Fang rests his head on Harry's knee.
Fang drools all over Harry's robes.
